hints.title: Complete Vanishing of Source at QSD
hints.content:
521: :label: thm-complete-j-vanishing
522: 
523: The full energy-momentum source term, including all contributions, vanishes at the quasi-stationary distribution:
524: 
525: $$
526: J^\nu[\mu_{\text{QSD}}] = J^\nu_{\text{kin}} + J^\nu_{\text{adapt}} + J^\nu_{\text{visc}} + J^\nu_{\text{clone}} = 0
527: $$
528: 
529: **Component contributions**:
530: - $J^\nu_{\text{kin}} = 0$: Exact cancellation via equipartition (friction = noise)
531: - $J^\nu_{\text{adapt}} = 0$: Higher-order in $\epsilon_F$, negligible at fitness peaks
532: - $J^\nu_{\text{visc}} = 0$: Vanishes for isotropic distribution with no bulk flow
533: - $J^\nu_{\text{clone}} = 0$: Balanced fluctuations average to zero
534: 
535: **Convergence rate**: For $t \gg \tau_{\text{relax}}$:
536: 
537: $$
538: |J^\nu[\mu_t]| \leq C_J e^{-\kappa_{\text{QSD}} t}
539: $$
hints.raw_directive:
518: ## 5. Summary and Implications
519: 
520: :::{prf:theorem} Complete Vanishing of Source at QSD
521: :label: thm-complete-j-vanishing
522: 
523: The full energy-momentum source term, including all contributions, vanishes at the quasi-stationary distribution:
524: 
525: $$
526: J^\nu[\mu_{\text{QSD}}] = J^\nu_{\text{kin}} + J^\nu_{\text{adapt}} + J^\nu_{\text{visc}} + J^\nu_{\text{clone}} = 0
527: $$
528: 
529: **Component contributions**:
530: - $J^\nu_{\text{kin}} = 0$: Exact cancellation via equipartition (friction = noise)
531: - $J^\nu_{\text{adapt}} = 0$: Higher-order in $\epsilon_F$, negligible at fitness peaks
532: - $J^\nu_{\text{visc}} = 0$: Vanishes for isotropic distribution with no bulk flow
533: - $J^\nu_{\text{clone}} = 0$: Balanced fluctuations average to zero
534: 
535: **Convergence rate**: For $t \gg \tau_{\text{relax}}$:
536: 
537: $$
538: |J^\nu[\mu_t]| \leq C_J e^{-\kappa_{\text{QSD}} t}
539: $$
